description: Lists the application providers configured in the IAM Identity Center identity store.

nested_items.name: ApplicationProviders
nested_items.description: An array list of structures that describe application providers.

nested_items.name: ApplicationProviderArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the application provider.

nested_items.name: FederationProtocol
nested_items.description: The protocol that the application provider uses to perform federation.

nested_items.name: DisplayData
nested_items.description: A structure that describes how IAM Identity Center represents the application provider in the portal.

nested_items.name: DisplayName
nested_items.description: The name of the application provider that appears in the portal.

nested_items.name: IconUrl
nested_items.description: A URL that points to an icon that represents the application provider.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the application provider that appears in the portal.

nested_items.name: ResourceServerConfig
nested_items.description: A structure that describes the application provider's resource server.

nested_items.name: LongDescription
nested_items.description: The description of an access scope for a resource server.

nested_items.name: DetailedTitle
nested_items.description: The title of an access scope for a resource server.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If present, this value indicates that more output is available than is included in the current response. Use this value in the NextToken request parameter in a subsequent call to the operation to get the next part of the output. You should repeat this until the NextToken response element comes back as null. This indicates that this is the last page of results.
